description: This is a more subdued version of fried rice than the spicier Thai fried rice It’s a great dish to make if you have cooked rice on hand and a great vehicle for whatever vegetables may be in your refrigerator Feel free to add other cooked vegetables, meat or seafood.
title: Chinese Fried Rice With Shrimp and Peas
title_page: Chinese Fried Rice With Shrimp and Peas Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
This is a more subdued version of fried rice than the spicier Thai fried rice. It’s a great dish to make if you have cooked rice on hand and a great vehicle for whatever vegetables may be in your refrigerator. Feel free to add other cooked vegetables, meat or seafood.
Featured in: Chinese Fried Rice With Shrimp And Peas.
